title: Womens Dress
title_original: NAADAM Womens Luxe Cashmere Oversized Turtleneck

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Wonderful sweater….The great thick cashmere..just order it!I wear a med normally but ordered a small since the sweater is oversized..it is perfect!!! Read more
items.author: Bettye Parish Schuler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Beautiful!
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous sweater - soft, great weight and the arm shape sets it apart. It is cropped but looks great with high waisted pants/jeans. Read more
items.author: Leslie R Egan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious, High Fashion Mod! 100% Love! ❤️
items.body: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this new for Fall 2024 NAADAM luxurious cashmere sweater! The fit is perfect ! The boxy squarish style is perfect for my body style because I don’t have a defined and refined waistline- I’m more of a straight line through the torso body figure with just a slight curve. Also, I have a short torso and longer legs so cropped boxy works well for me. I’m 5’3” and weigh 125-130 waist is 28”. This is a beautiful, high fashion, thickly woven (as thick as cashmere can comfortably be without being causing me to sweat!) warm, snuggly sweater at a good, fair price for an excellent quality 2 ply cashmere. I always hold cashmere up to a bright light to check the weave. NAADAM is a reputable, reliable and great quality cashmere clothing company. I have many of their beloved cashmere pieces in my wardrobe staples that I have purchased over the years from a well known very upscale store that is now selling on the luxury shops of Amazon. I’m excited to be able to order from them on Amazon. I love their cashmere and especially this super mod black mock turtleneck crop sweater! Love , love love these with my skinny charcoal grey leather lambskin pants and a pair of pointed mules! Upload a pic later. I highly recommend NAADAM cashmere! Thank you NAADAM & VINE! Read more
items.author: Shoppher on the Fly!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous flattering construction
items.body: Love this sweater so much, it has become a go-to that I reach for over and over when I want something simple that makes me feel confident and comfortable. It has a thick heavyweight feel yet is breathable and comfortable. The high neck looks elegant and structured, yet is loose enough to remain comfortable and breathable (sometimes turtlenecks can make me feel a bit strangled, but not this one). The quality is gorgeous -- it's constructed in such a way that it drapes beautifully. It is a bit pricey but absolutely worth it as a high quality investment piece for your wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Sterling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality Cashmere Sweater! Super Soft & Well Made!
items.body: This is my new favorite sweater! The material is very soft, thick and feels durable. Nothing about this sweater feels cheap. It is more of a short length sweater, almost like a crop style. I guess maybe on someone with a longer torso or someone taller it would be. I'm only 5' tall so it doesn't fit me like a crop top it's just shorter in length but that's fine I'll just wear a light weight tank top under it. This sweater is stylish and matches pretty much everything so it's easy to pair with jeans, pants, shoes, ext. It washed well in my washer and dryed well on tumble dry / no heat. Overall this is a very good quality cashmere sweater, it is very comfortable, great for lounging about or going out and about. It is thick and feels durable. It is pricey but you get what you pay for and this sweather in my opinion is a good value and I would recommend this product if you have the extra $$ to spend on it. Read more
items.author: Shiloh 2024

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black, Oatmeal, Merlot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
